Light Class Reference
Light Control

Documentation

This class controls the flashlight on/off/brightness

Here is a quick example of how to toggle the light output and adjust the brightness.

#include <fogo/Light.hpp>
#include <fogo/FSys.hpp>
//toggle the light
Light::set_enable( !Light::enabled() );
//Set the brightness to the system high brightness setting
Light::set_brightness( Sys::brightness_high() );

Definition at line 31 of file Light.hpp.

Static Public Member Functions

static int set_enable (bool v=true)
 Turn the light on and off.
 
static int set_brightness (float v)
 Set the light brightness between 0.0 and 100.0.
 
static bool enabled (void)
 Checks if light is on.
 
static float brightness (void)
 Returns the current brightness value (0.0 to 100.0)
